pt: {sc}doubtful{/sc} {sc}dubious{/sc} {sc}problematic{/sc} {sc}questionable{/sc} mean not affording assurance of the worth, soundness, or certainty of something. {sc}doubtful{/sc} implies little more than a lack of conviction or certainty.

pt.t: {it}doubtful{/it} about whether I said the right thing
{it}dubious{/it} about the practicality of the scheme

pt: {sc}problematic{/sc} applies especially to things whose existence, meaning, fulfillment, or realization is highly uncertain.

pt.t: whether the project will ever be finished is {it}problematic{/it}

pt: {sc}questionable{/sc} may imply no more than the existence of doubt but usually suggests that the suspicions are well-grounded.

shortdef: posing a problem : difficult to solve or decide
open to question or debate : questionable

dt: {bc}something that is problematic {bc}a problematic aspect or concern

shortdef: something that is problematic : a problematic aspect or concern
